73//*****************************************************************************
74//
75// I2C Address to use
76//
77//*****************************************************************************
78#ifndef I2C_SLAVE_ADDR
79#define I2C_SLAVE_ADDR 0x10
80#endif
81
82//*****************************************************************************
83//
85//
86//*****************************************************************************
87#ifndef USE_FLAG_PAGE
88#define USE_FLAG_PAGE 0
89#endif
90
91//*****************************************************************************
92//
94//
95//*****************************************************************************
96#ifndef FLAG_PAGE_LOCATION
97#define FLAG_PAGE_LOCATION 0x00004000
98#endif
99
100//*****************************************************************************
101//
103//
104//*****************************************************************************
105//
106// The value here must match (at least) with the ROLength restriction imposed at
107// bootloader linker configuration
108//
109#ifndef MAX_BOOTLOADER_SIZE
110#define MAX_BOOTLOADER_SIZE 0x00004000
111#endif
112//
113// The value here must match (at least) with the RWLength restriction imposed at
114// bootloader linker configuration
115//
116#ifndef MAX_SRAM_USED
117#define MAX_SRAM_USED 0x00004000
118#endif
119
120extern am_util_bootloader_image_t *g_psBootImage;
121
122//*****************************************************************************
123//
125//
126//*****************************************************************************
127#if USE_FLAG_PAGE == 1
128#if FLAG_PAGE_LOCATION & (AM_HAL_FLASH_PAGE_SIZE - 1)
129#error "Flag Page address not page aligned"
130#endif
131#if FLAG_PAGE_LOCATION < MAX_BOOTLOADER_SIZE
132#error "Flag Page overlaps with Bootloader"
133#endif
134#endif
135
136//*****************************************************************************
137//
139//
140//*****************************************************************************
141#ifndef DEFAULT_LINK_ADDRESS
142#define DEFAULT_LINK_ADDRESS ((uint32_t *) 0x00008000)
143#endif
144//
145// Default override configured as invalid
146//
147#ifndef DEFAULT_OVERRIDE_GPIO
148#define DEFAULT_OVERRIDE_GPIO (0xFFFFFFFF)
149#endif
150#ifndef DEFAULT_OVERRIDE_POLARITY
151#define DEFAULT_OVERRIDE_POLARITY AM_BOOTLOADER_OVERRIDE_LOW
152#endif
153
154//*****************************************************************************
155//
157//
158//*****************************************************************************
159#define AM_BOOTLOADER_VERSION_NUM 0x00000001
160
161//*****************************************************************************
162//
164//
165//*****************************************************************************
166#define AM_BOOTLOADER_ACK 0x00000000
167#define AM_BOOTLOADER_NAK 0x00000001
168#define AM_BOOTLOADER_READY 0x00000002
169#define AM_BOOTLOADER_IMAGE_COMPLETE 0x00000003
170#define AM_BOOTLOADER_BAD_CRC 0x00000004
171#define AM_BOOTLOADER_ERROR 0x00000005
172#define AM_BOOTLOADER_BL_VERSION 0x00000006
173#define AM_BOOTLOADER_FW_VERSION 0x00000007
174
175//*****************************************************************************
176//
178//
179//*****************************************************************************
180#define AM_BOOTLOADER_ACK_CMD 0x00000000
181#define AM_BOOTLOADER_NAK_CMD 0x00000001
182#define AM_BOOTLOADER_NEW_IMAGE 0x00000002
183#define AM_BOOTLOADER_NEW_PACKET 0x00000003
184#define AM_BOOTLOADER_RESET 0x00000004
185#define AM_BOOTLOADER_SET_OVERRIDE_CMD 0x00000005
186#define AM_BOOTLOADER_BL_VERSION_CMD 0x00000006
187#define AM_BOOTLOADER_FW_VERSION_CMD 0x00000007
188#define AM_BOOTLOADER_NEW_ENCRYPTED_IMAGE 0x00000008
189#define AM_BOOTLOADER_RESTART 0x00000009
190
